item.title: Masters Acceptance!

item.title: A Welcome
item.description: Welcome to my blog. I’m currently a Third Year Biomedical Science student at Plymouth University who still is clinging onto the hope of one day studying Medicine in the near future. I say, the near future, as unfortunately my application for 2016 Entry is no longer under consideration by all four universities.
